H0.text: who was the ottoman governor who led egypt in the years following the napoleonic wars. Muhammad Ali Pasha

H1.text: who was the ottoman governor who led egypt in the years following the napoleonic wars. Yussuf Pasha

H2.text: who was the ottoman governor who led egypt in the years following the napoleonic wars. Ibrahim Pasha

H3.text: who was the ottoman governor who led egypt in the years following the napoleonic wars. Husrev Pasha

A4.text: Muhammad Ali Pasha seized power in 1805, and established a quasi-independent state.

A5.text: Yousuf Pasha took the land route from Damascus by al-Arish after Bonaparte's departure.
